item.title: Create a header that appears and disappears by scrolling
item.description: Headers can be animated easily by CSS and a few JavaScript, but the speed will be constant. I hate that, so I’ll create a header that works naturally like this. Sample code & Demo See the Pen Awesome header by Akimo (@akimon658) on CodePen. This script changes the value of top by scrolling.
